feed.title: RSE Events
feed.subtitle: Welcome to the GitHub-powered RSE Events site!

entry.title: Model-Driven Engineering Network (MDENet) Workshop on Research Software

link.title: Model-Driven Engineering Network (MDENet) Workshop on Research Software

entry.content:
On October 31st, MDENet, the EPSRC-funded network on Model-Driven Engineering, is holding a thematic workshop on Research Software at King’s College London.

This one-day event aims to improve mutual understanding of challenges in Research Software and opportunities for Model-Driven Engineering to help address them.

Here is the call for expressions of interest: https://mde-network.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/Call-for-EOI-workshop-Research-Software.pdf and the application form: https://forms.office.com/e/YK53MD1hrv There is also a travel and accommodation support fund of up to £300, that you can find here: https://forms.office.com/e/S9pgbWZ6qU
